channel.title: Oisín Flynn-Connolly — Now
channel.description: Recent articles, talks, and events from Oisín Flynn-Connolly.

item.title: An obstruction theory for strictly commutative algebras in positive characteristic — published in AGT
item.description: Published in Algebraic and Geometric Topology, 11 February 2026. Defines cotriple products and shows E∞-algebras are weakly equivalent to commutative algebras iff higher Steenrod operations vanish coherently.

item.title: Central limits via dilated categories — preprint
item.description: New preprint with Henning Basold, Chase Ford and Hao Wang. Introduces dilated seminorm-enriched category theory as a unifying framework for central limits, with applications to the classical CLT and a novel CLT for symplectic manifolds.

item.title: On associative and commutative differential graded algebras in positive characteristic
item.description: Published online in Mathematical Intelligencer, 27 December 2025. Expository paper explaining constructions from the obstruction theory paper for a general mathematical audience.

item.title: Determinant Massey products — Topological Activities seminar, Stockholm University
item.description: Research talk, 4 November 2025.

item.title: On the divisibility of sums of Fibonacci numbers — published in Integers
item.description: Published in Integers: Electronic Journal of Combinatorial Number Theory 25 (2025), #A87, 17 September 2025. Shows that for infinitely many odd integers n, the sum of the first n Fibonacci numbers is divisible by n, resolving a conjecture of Fatehizadeh and Yaqubi.

item.title: Mathematical Structures in Computer Science — Leiden University
item.description: Lecturer and tutorial supervision for third-year course at Leiden University, 2025–2026.

item.title: On the divisibility of sums of Fibonacci numbers — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 14 April 2025. Shows that for infinitely many odd integers n, the sum of the first n Fibonacci numbers is divisible by n. Published in Integers (2025).

item.title: Homotopy Probability Theory I & II — STyLo seminar, Leiden University
item.description: Three expository talks on homotopy probability theory, March–April 2025, STyLo probability seminar, Leiden University.

item.title: Co-Eilenberg Moore categories for operads — NetTCS, University of Twente
item.description: Research talk, March 2025.

item.title: Corecognition for iterated suspensions — Theory seminar, Leiden University
item.description: Research talk, February 2025.

item.title: A p-adic de Rham complex — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 17 January 2025 (new version in preparation). Constructs, analogously to Sullivan's A_PL-functor, a strictly commutative algebra over the p-adic numbers computing singular cohomology.

item.title: Corecognition for iterated suspensions — Rencontre 2024 de Topologie algébrique, Toulouse
item.description: Research talk, October 2024.

item.title: PhD thesis defence: Higher commutativity in algebra and algebraic topology
item.description: PhD thesis defended 4 October 2024, supervised by Grégory Ginot, Université Sorbonne Paris Nord.

item.title: Strictly commutative algebra in positive characteristic — Séminaire Topologie, Université de Lille
item.description: Research talk, 27 September 2024.

item.title: Strictly commutative algebra in positive characteristic — Séminaire d'Homotopie et Géométrie Algébrique, Toulouse
item.description: Research talk, 17 September 2024.

item.title: Higher invariants in homotopy theory — 37th Annual Meeting of the Irish Mathematical Society, Belfast
item.description: Research talk, August 2024.

item.title: An obstruction theory for strictly commutative algebras in positive characteristic — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 25 April 2024. Defines cotriple products and proves that E∞-algebras are weakly equivalent to commutative algebras iff higher Steenrod operations vanish coherently. Published in Algebraic and Geometric Topology (2026).

item.title: Gröbner bases and automated theorem proving — PhD student seminar, Université Sorbonne Paris Nord
item.description: Expository talk, April 2024.

item.title: Strictly commutative algebra in positive characteristic — Seminar of Algebra, Seville University
item.description: Research talk, February 2024.

item.title: Strictly commutative algebra in positive characteristic — Topological Activities seminar, Stockholm University
item.description: Research talk, 15 January 2024.

item.title: Simplicial coendomorphism operads and coalgebras — preprint
item.description: Preprint. Uses Kan's Ex∞-functor to construct a coendomorphism operad internal to simplicial sets, and shows that simplicial n-fold suspensions are coalgebras up to coherent homotopy over the Barratt–Eccles En-operad.

item.title: The geometry of iterated suspensions — Séminaire Topologie, Université de Lille
item.description: Research talk, 17 November 2023.

item.title: p-adic homotopy theory — seminar, Universidad de Málaga
item.description: Research talk, November 2023.

item.title: Three Schur functors related to pre-Lie algebras — published in MPCPS
item.description: Published online in Mathematical Proceedings of the Cambridge Philosophical Society, 16 October 2023 (print volume 2024). Gives explicit combinatorial descriptions of three Schur functors arising in the theory of pre-Lie algebras.

item.title: The geometry of iterated suspensions — Séminaire de l'équipe Topologie Algébrique, Université Sorbonne Paris Nord
item.description: Research talk, October 2023.

item.title: Corecognition for iterated suspensions — 36th Meeting of the Irish Mathematical Society (poster)
item.description: Poster presentation, September 2023.

item.title: Corecognition for iterated suspensions — Young Topologists Meeting, Lausanne (poster)
item.description: Poster presentation, July 2023.

item.title: Higher order Massey products for algebras over algebraic operads — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 26 April 2023 (with José M. Moreno-Fernández). Introduces higher-order Massey products for algebras over algebraic operads and shows they represent differentials in the operadic Eilenberg–Moore spectral sequence.

item.title: Introduction to ∞-categories — PhD topology seminar, Université Sorbonne Paris Nord
item.description: Expository talk, November 2022.

item.title: A recognition principle for iterated suspensions as coalgebras over the little cubes operad — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 3 October 2022 (with José M. Moreno-Fernández and Felix Wierstra). Proves a recognition principle for iterated suspensions as coalgebras over the little disks operads.

item.title: Master thesis defence: The homotopy theory of the little n-discs operad
item.description: Master thesis defended 17 July 2020, supervised by Felix Wierstra.

item.title: Three Schur functors related to pre-Lie algebras — preprint
item.description: Preprint posted to arXiv, 3 January 2020 (with Vladimir Dotsenko). Published in Mathematical Proceedings of the Cambridge Philosophical Society (2023/2024).
